name: Happiness Guaranteed
description:
With the assistance of your alternate reality dating app, matchmake endless combinations of people and see how their lives play out!

1.2

Bug Fixes//

Commit asks will now properly read as "Wants to Commit" and not "Wants to Date".

1.1 Updates: Fixed issues with the Trackbar

-Invites will not consume as many message points and not generate more than one.

-Favorite status can change depending on date results, Matches may ask you to Commit if they are above Datable status.
